did.unittitle: Albany State College (formerly Georgia Normal and Agricultural College, later Albany State University)

physdesc.extent: Announcements for 1954/55, 1961/62. 1967/68-1969/71, 1973/75-1975/77 Preliminary Announcements for 1958/59 Flyer with photos rec'd May 26, 1958

did.abstract: Located in Albany, Georgia. Founded in 1903 as Albany Bible and Manual Training Institute; changed name to Georgia Normal and Agricultural College in 1917; became Albany State College in 1943, then Albany State University in 1996. Part of the University System of Georgia.
